meanings.sent1: The naughty child tried to bespit his sister with his saliva during the argument.
meanings.sent2: Please do not bespit the mirror with your spit when cleaning it.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy decided to bespit the clean floor with his drool, leaving a trail behind.
